attributes.action: National day of mourning for corona virus dead in Uk
attributes.additional_details: I want the families of the people that have died from Coronavirus to feel that the citizens of the UK collectively recognise their grief and send their love to them.
attributes.background: Declare a national day of mourning for the people that have died from corona virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

National holiday of remembrance of those who died during the virus covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311923

Designate a day for the recognition of our NHS and all Emergency Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308614

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
